Equals.name: pos_lag_time
Equals.description: Maximum allowable duration outside of maximum position lag value in seconds.

Equals.name: pos_lag_mon_val
Equals.description: Maximum magnitude of position lag in EU.

Equals.name: plc_soft_limit_min
Equals.description: Minimum commandable position of the axis in EU.

Equals.name: plc_soft_limit_max
Equals.description: Maximum commandable position of the axis in EU.

Equals.name: enc_offset
Equals.description: Encoder Offset converted into actual position units.

Equals.name: enc_scale
Equals.description: Encoder scaling numerator / denominator in EU/COUNT.

Equals.description: Enable/Disable state of Position Lag Monitor.
